info.title: CISCO-IETF-ATM2-PVCTRAP-MIB-EXTN MIB API
info.description:
This MIB Module is a supplement to the
    CISCO-IETF-ATM2-PVCTRAP-MIB.

‚ö†Ô∏è **IMPORTANT - MIB DATA ACCESS**:
This YANG model exists for SMIv2-to-YANG translation purposes, but MIB data on IOS-XE devices is primarily accessed via **SNMP protocol**, not RESTCONF.

**RESTCONF Limitation**: Many MIB paths may return 404 errors via RESTCONF `/data` endpoints because the device exposes MIB data through SNMP, not the YANG datastore.

**Recommended Access Methods**:
- Use SNMP (v2c/v3) to query MIB data directly
- Use NETCONF `<get>` operations for devices supporting YANG-modeled MIB access
- Check device capabilities: some newer IOS-XE versions may support limited RESTCONF access to specific MIBs

**YANG Model Purpose**: These YANG models define the structure of SNMP MIBs in YANG format for tooling compatibility, but do not guarantee RESTCONF data availability.


**üìä YANG Tree:** [View CISCO-IETF-ATM2-PVCTRAP-MIB-EXTN structure](https://jeremycohoe.github.io/cisco-ios-xe-openapi-swagger/yang-trees/CISCO-IETF-ATM2-PVCTRAP-MIB-EXTN.html)

get.description: Retrieve atmCurrentStatusChangePVclTable operational data from MIB

schema.description:
A table indicating all VCLs for which there is an
        active row in the atmVclTable having an atmVclConnKind
        value of `pvc' and atmVclOperStatus to have changed in the
        last PVC notification interval.

atmCurrentStatusChangePVclEntry.description:
Each entry in the table represents a VCL for which
          there is an active row in the atmVclTable having an
          atmVclConnKind value of `pvc' and atmVclOperStatus
          to have changed in the last PVC notification interval.

atmPVclStatusTransition.description:
The number of state transitions that has happened 
            on this PVCL in the last notification interval.

atmPVclStatusChangeStart.description:
The time stamp at which this PVCL changed state for the
            first time in  the last notification interval.

atmPVclStatusChangeEnd.description:
The time stamp of the last state change of this PVCL
            in the last notification interval.

get.description: Retrieve list of atmCurrentStatusChangePVclEntry entries from MIB

schema.description:
Each entry in the table represents a VCL for which
          there is an active row in the atmVclTable having an
          atmVclConnKind value of `pvc' and atmVclOperStatus
          to have changed in the last PVC notification interval.

atmPVclStatusTransition.description:

atmPVclStatusChangeStart.description:

            first time in  the last notification interval.

atmPVclStatusChangeEnd.description:
The time stamp of the last state change of this PVCL
            in the last notification interval.

get.description: Retrieve specific atmCurrentStatusChangePVclEntry entry by key from MIB

atmPVclStatusTransition.description:
The number of state transitions that has happened 
            on this PVCL in the last notification interval.

atmPVclStatusChangeStart.description:
The time stamp at which this PVCL changed state for the
            first time in  the last notification interval.

atmPVclStatusChangeEnd.description:
The time stamp of the last state change of this PVCL
            in the last notification interval.

get.description: Retrieve atmStatusChangePVclRangeTable operational data from MIB

schema.description:
A table indicating more than one VCLs in a consecutive 
        range and for each VCL there is an active row in the 
        atmVclTable having an atmVclConnKind value of `pvc'
        and atmVclOperStatus to have changed in the same
        direction in the last PVC notification interval.

atmStatusChangePVclRangeEntry.description:
Each entry in this table represents a range of VCLs and 
          for each VCL there is an active row in the atmVclTable having
          an atmVclConnKind value of 'pvc' and atmVclOperStatus to have
          changed in the same direction in the last notification 
          interval.

rangeIndex.description:
Index to represent different ranges, the first range is 
            indexed by value 0, the second by 1 and so on...

atmPVclLowerRangeValue.description:
The first PVCL in a range of PVcls for which the 
            atmVclOperStatus to have changed in the last 
            notification interval.

atmPVclHigherRangeValue.description:
The last PVCL in a range of PVcls for which the 
            atmOperStatus to have changed in the last 
            notification interval.

atmPVclRangeStatusChangeStart.description:
The time stamp at which the first PVCL in the range
            changed state in the last notification interval.

atmPVclRangeStatusChangeEnd.description:
The time stamp at which the last PVCL in the range
            changed state in the last notification interval.
